sakai:title: Get a slideshow
sakai:shortDescription: Get a slide show from Slideshare.
sakai:description: Get a slide show from Slideshare.

This template requires an API key. It can be defined at ./load/org.sakaiproject.nakamura.proxy.SlideshareProxyPreProcessor.cfg
slideshare.apiKey=0XXXyyy slideshare.sharedSecret=XXXXyyyX
sakai:response: Gives back data about the Slideshow.
